about_the_game:
《Tolampis》is an adventure game in a watercolor hand-painted style independently developed by Yahnart, an illustrator artist. You will play as a firefly to explore a mysterious forest named Tolampis. In a bizarre visual experience, you will unravel the dark mysteries shrouding the forest and re-energize it.

Game Features:

  • Explore the dark forest of Tolampis. The invasion of dark forces has caused mutations in the plants, making them full of aggression.

  • Players will conduct exploration while flying and search for rune fragments in every corner.
    Different kinds of night elves will endow players with different abilities to solve the problems they face.

  • Musical elements will become an important part of the gameplay process, helping you find rune fragments.

  • There will be puzzle-solving parts during the exploration process. You need to use the collected information to figure out solutions to the problems.

  • Your exploration progress in the game will change the story direction of the game, and the development of the game will be determined by the players.

  • Enjoy the visual effects that integrate hand-painted animation techniques and bring life to the wonderful game visuals.

  • In the psychedelic music atmosphere created by the artist, take a deep breath and face various challenges.

You will look for faint lights in the dark forest and explore in the psychedelic music and whimsical ideas.
